verses.verse: Then the men <WH376> of Ephraim <WH669> were summoned, <WH6817> and they crossed <WH5674> to Zaphon <WH6829> and said <WH559> to Jephthah, <WH3316> "Why <WH4069> did you cross <WH5674> over <WH5674> to fight <WH3898> against the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> without <WH3808> calling <WH7121> us to go <WH1980> with you? We will burn <WH8313> your house <WH1004> down on you."

And Jephthah <WH3316> said <WH559> to them, "I and my people <WH5971> were at great <WH3966> strife <WH7379> with the sons <WH1121> of Ammon; <WH5983> when I called <WH2199> you, you did not deliver <WH3467> me from their hand. <WH3027>

"And when I saw <WH7200> that you would not deliver <WH3467> [me,] I took <WH7760> my life <WH5315> in my hands <WH3709> and crossed <WH5674> over <WH5674> against <WH413> the sons <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> and the Lord <WH3068> gave <WH5414> them into my hand. <WH3027> Why <WH4100> then have you come <WH5927> up to me this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> to fight <WH3898> against me?"

Then Jephthah <WH3316> gathered <WH6908> all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Gilead <WH1568> and fought <WH3898> Ephraim; <WH669> and the men <WH376> of Gilead <WH1568> defeated <WH5221> Ephraim, <WH669> because <WH3588> they said, <WH559> "You are fugitives <WH6412> of Ephraim, <WH669> O Gileadites, <WH1568> in the midst <WH8432> of Ephraim <WH669> [and] in the midst <WH8432> of Manasseh. <WH4519>"

And the Gileadites <WH1568> captured <WH3920> the fords <WH9278> of the Jordan <WH3383> opposite Ephraim. <WH669> And it happened <WH1961> when <WH3588> [any of] the fugitives <WH6412> of Ephraim <WH669> said, <WH559> "Let me cross <WH5674> over, <WH5674>" the men <WH376> of Gilead <WH1568> would say <WH559> to him, "Are you an Ephraimite <WH673>?" If he said, <WH559> "No, <WH3808>"

then they would say <WH559> to him, "Say <WH559> now, <WH4994> 'Shibboleth. <WH9578>'" But he said, <WH559> "Sibboleth, <WH5451>" for he could <WH3559> not pronounce <WH1696> it correctly. <WH3651> Then they seized <WH270> him and slew <WH7819> him at the fords <WH9278> of the Jordan. <WH3383> Thus there fell <WH5307> at that time <WH6256> 42000 of Ephraim. <WH669>

And Jephthah <WH3316> judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> six <WH8337> years. <WH8141> Then Jephthah <WH3316> the Gileadite <WH1569> died <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> in [one of] the cities <WH5892> of Gilead. <WH1568>
Now Ibzan <WH78> of Bethlehem <WH1035> judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> after <WH310> him.

And he had <WH1961> thirty <WH7970> sons, <WH1121> and thirty <WH7970> daughters <WH1323> [whom] he gave <WH7971> in marriage outside <WH2351> [the family,] and he brought <WH935> in thirty <WH7970> daughters <WH1323> from outside <WH2351> for his sons. <WH1121> And he judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> seven <WH7651> years. <WH8141>
Then Ibzan <WH78> died <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> in Bethlehem. <WH1035>
Now Elon <WH356> the Zebulunite <WH2075> judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> after <WH310> him; and he judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> ten <WH6235> years. <WH8141>
Then Elon <WH356> the Zebulunite <WH2075> died <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> at Aijalon <WH357> in the land <WH776> of Zebulun. <WH2074>
Now Abdon <WH5658> the son <WH1121> of Hillel <WH1985> the Pirathonite <WH6553> judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> after <WH310> him.

And he had <WH1961> forty <WH705> sons <WH1121> and thirty <WH7970> grandsons <WH1121> who rode <WH7392> on seventy <WH7657> donkeys; <WH5895> and he judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> eight <WH8083> years. <WH8141>

Then Abdon <WH5658> the son <WH1121> of Hillel <WH1985> the Pirathonite <WH6553> died <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> at Pirathon <WH6552> in the land <WH776> of Ephraim, <WH669> in the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of the Amalekites. <WH6003>
